posts.post_content:
Pretty rough little lot but cheap enough. Includes a tough Southern Leaguer. Most cards have an issue or two...the Nattress has had some pencil writing removed, some back damage, the Kruger is trimmed (poorly) and a variety of problems..SOLD ppd. Paypal, PPGift, check, ok. would likely trade for a similar lot if there is a possibility I can upgrade a few of my worst beaters. At this time only selling as a lot, but may break up.
